alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Somerset (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 01 at 8:09PM EDT until July 01 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS State College
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Pennsylvania, including the following counties, Bedford and Somerset. * WHEN...Until 1015 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 808 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall of 0.5 to 1.5 inches is expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Somerset, Bedford, Friedens, Central City, Buffalo Mills, Hooversville, Indian Lake, Stoystown, Schellsburg, Manns Choice, Shanksville, New Baltimore and Flight 93 National Memorial. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
